snippet.title: Avowed Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Set in the fictional world of Eora that was first introduced to players in the Pillars of Eternity franchise, Avowed is a first-person fantasy RPG from the award-winning team at Obsidian Entertainment. 

Explore the Living Lands, a mysterious island filled with adventure and danger. As an envoy of Aedyr, you are sent to investigate rumors of a spreading plague with a secret that threatens to destroy everything. Can you save the island and your soul from the forces threatening to tear them apart? 

To read more on Avowed, visit the Xbox Wire post here. https://news.xbox.com/en-us/2023/06/11/obsidians-avowed-is-coming-in-2024/
